name: Guardian Mod
description:
Adds a new playable enemy character: The Guardian. 
 
 If you like the mod and want to support me, check out my multiplayer party game, Sumo, in Early Access on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/858960/Sumo/  
 
 Extra thanks to the creators of Mod the Spire and the Discord modding community.  
 
 Credit: kiooeht - The god.   Blank the Evil, Evil Pickle, JohnnyDevo, Reina, JohnnyBazooka89, Skyson, HypoSoc, Chronometrics, kobting, moocowgoesmoo for all the help.  Shoutout to Rhapsody (YouTube) for all the modded content creation!
